content.rendered:
A bi-weekly podcast that goes in depth into projects recently reviewed on Brand New, featuring conversations with the designers — and sometimes their clients — uncovering the context, background, and design decisions behind the work.

Your subscription to Brand New includes a unique podcast feed link for you to use in open-protocol podcast apps like Apple Podcasts, Overcast, and Pocket Casts. The Follow-Up is not available on iTunes, Spotify, or Google Podcasts.

FAQs

When do new episodes come out?

Every other Tuesday.

How come the podcast isn’t available on iTunes, Spotify, Stitcher, Soundcloud, or Google Podcasts?

Because none of those platforms allow the flexibility needed to manage subscriptions and protect the content.

How do I listen to The Follow-up then?

Once logged in, you will see a text link to “Access Podcast”, this will automatically detect if you are on Mac or PC and if you are on mobile whether you are using Android or iOS and will present the available options. It works perfectly on Apple Podcasts, Overcast, and Pocket Casts. You can also listen directly on this website by linking through the episode archive.

Are transcripts available for the deaf and hard of hearing community?

Yes. Once logged in, the transcript will be available on this website by linking through the episode list.

Will you release an episode every two weeks?

That’s the plan but there will be weeks that different circumstances might not allow us to do so: could be vacation, could be extreme busyness in other aspects of work, could be illness… who knows. So it’s possible we will miss a few weeks here and there throughout the year.

Most recent episodes

  • King Arthur Baking Company
  • OneFootball
  • Waze
  • Museu Nacional da República
  • Banana Slugs

For a full list see here.
